document.full_text: an ink-cartridge seller that has operated under different names has been the subject of many complaints to the better business bureau. but the bureau's rating system still mystifies the haggler.
document.title: the haggler: the names change, but the complaints don't
lines_and_colors: an ink-cartridge seller that has operated under different names has been the subject of many complaints to the better business bureau. but the bureau's rating system still mystifies the haggler.
